trans-unit.source: The abstract class from which all workflow tracking records derive.
trans-unit.target: 从所有的工作流跟踪记录派生的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Tracking records represent the data sent to tracking participants when tracked events occur.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪记录表示发送给跟踪参与者，当被跟踪的事件发生时的数据。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class with the specified instance tracking record.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，使用指定的实例跟踪记录创建派生类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The tracking record of the generating activity.
trans-unit.target: 生成的活动跟踪记录。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class with the specified instance ID.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，创建派生类的新实例替换为指定的实例 id。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the generating workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 生成的工作流实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class with the specified instance ID and record number.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，使用指定的实例 ID 和记录号创建派生类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the generating workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 生成的工作流实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that defines the order in which tracking records are generated.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义跟踪记录生成顺序的序列。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents a collection of name/value pairs that are added to this tracking record.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，表示添加到此跟踪记录的名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary of elements to be added to this tracking record.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到此跟踪记录的元素的字典。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一份<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the time the tracking record occurred.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，表示跟踪记录发生的时间。

trans-unit.source: The event time.
trans-unit.target: 事件时间。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, represents the ID of the generating workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，表示生成的工作流实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The element ID.
trans-unit.target: 元素 id。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel"></xref> of the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel"></xref>的事件。

trans-unit.source: The trace level.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪级别。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that defines the order in which tracking records are generated.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义跟踪记录生成顺序的序列。

trans-unit.source: The sequence order.
trans-unit.target: 序列顺序。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns a string that contains all tracking data from the record.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，返回一个字符串，包含记录中的所有跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: The tracking data.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据。
